entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonaventure
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
